paper_abstract: This paper deals with the analysis of a Chagas' disease model consisting of acute and chronic, resistance classes along with vector population. Local as well as global analyses have been carried out for the model with or without resistance class. We identify the parameter that controls the dynamics of the system. The results are also verified through numerical simulation. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Qualitative study of a model of Chagas' disease
